description: Light web browser app. Browse the web and stay incognito.  Highlights:  Light / Dark theme  Floating window  Clear all cache / history  Ad blocker  Multiple search engines supported as Google, DuckDuckGo, Yahoo, Qwant...  G Browser is an app focused on quick search. This application is open source on github !!! https://github.com/Mercandj/browser Do not hesitate to submit merge request, open issue...  Developed in kotlin with <3 by Team Mercan Enjoy G Browser =)
